name: OrcCraft
description: This is very simple leveling survivor action RTS game. with Zombie. If you're bored, this game would be perfect.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window7 Processor: Intel(R) Cor(TM) i3 CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 750 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window10 Processor: Intel(R) Cor(TM) i7-3770 CPU @ 3.40GHz   2.40GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 1050TI Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
